text: Rosemary's Baby is a 1968 American horror movie directed by Roman Polanski. It is set in New York City. It is based on the novel of the same name. This movie is about a young housewife who has a baby. The baby turns out to be a child of the Devil. Mia Farrow plays Rosemary. Ruth Gordon plays Minnie. The movie was well received by critics upon its release. ==Cast== * Mia Farrow as Rosemary Woodhouse * Roy Barcroft as Sun-Browned Man (uncredited) ==Other websites== * * * Category:1968 drama movies Category:1968 horror movies Category:English- language movies Category:American drama movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies about demons Category:Movies about babies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Roman Polanski Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Rosemary's Baby
